info.title: cdev Unified API
info.description: JSON-RPC 2.0 API for cdev mobile AI coding agent

methods.name: workspace/git/status
methods.summary: Get git status for a workspace
methods.description: Returns the git status for the specified workspace.

methods.name: workspace/git/stage
methods.description: Stages the specified files for commit in the workspace.

methods.name: repository/index/status
methods.description: Returns the current status of the repository index including file counts, sizes, and last scan time.

methods.name: status/health
methods.description: Returns a simple health check response for monitoring.

methods.name: session/list
methods.description: Returns a list of available sessions from all configured AI agents.

params.name: agent_type
params.description: Filter by agent type (optional)

params.name: limit
params.description: Maximum number of sessions to return

methods.name: workspace/status
methods.description: Returns detailed status for a specific workspace including git tracker state, active sessions, and watch status.

methods.name: workspace/session/unwatch
methods.description: Stops watching the currently watched session. No more claude_message events will be sent for that session.

methods.name: workspace/git/branches
methods.description: Returns the list of git branches for the workspace.

methods.name: repository/files/tree
methods.description: Returns a hierarchical tree structure of the repository with files and directories.

methods.name: repository/index/rebuild
methods.description: Triggers a full re-index of the repository in the background. Returns immediately.

methods.name: workspace/subscriptions
methods.description: Returns the list of workspaces this client is subscribed to. Empty list means all events are received.

methods.name: agent/run
methods.summary: Start an AI agent with a prompt
methods.description: Starts the specified AI agent (Claude, Gemini, or Codex) with the given prompt. Can start a new session or continue an existing one.

params.name: prompt
params.description: The prompt to send to the agent

params.name: mode
params.description: Session mode: 'new' for new session, 'continue' to continue existing

params.name: session_id
params.description: Session ID to continue (required if mode is 'continue')

methods.name: workspace/cache/invalidate
methods.description: Clears the cached repository discovery results. The next workspace/discover call will perform a fresh scan.

methods.name: session/start
methods.summary: Start a Claude session for a workspace
methods.description: Starts a new Claude CLI session for the specified workspace. Only one session per workspace is allowed.

methods.name: session/respond
methods.summary: Respond to a permission or question
methods.description: Responds to a pending permission request or interactive question from Claude.

methods.name: session/state
methods.summary: Get session runtime state for reconnection
methods.description: Returns the full runtime state of a session including Claude state, pending tool use, and waiting status. Use this to sync state when reconnecting from a mobile device.

methods.name: agent/stop
methods.description: Stops the currently running AI agent gracefully.

methods.name: git/stage
methods.description: Stages the specified files for commit.

params.name: paths
params.description: Array of file paths to stage

methods.name: git/discard
methods.description: Discards changes to the specified files.

params.name: paths
params.description: Array of file paths to discard

methods.name: git/checkout
methods.description: Checks out the specified branch.

params.name: branch
params.description: Branch name to checkout

methods.name: workspace/git/commit
methods.summary: Commit staged changes for a workspace
methods.description: Creates a commit with the staged changes in the workspace.

methods.name: workspace/subscribeAll
methods.description: Clear workspace filters and receive events from all workspaces (default behavior).

methods.name: git/status
methods.description: Returns the current git status including staged, unstaged, and untracked files.

methods.name: session/get
methods.description: Returns detailed information about a specific session.

params.name: session_id
params.description: Session ID to retrieve

params.name: agent_type
params.description: Agent type (optional, searches all if not specified)

methods.name: workspace/discover
methods.description: Scans directories to find git repositories that can be added as workspaces.

methods.name: session/info
methods.description: Returns detailed information about a specific session.

methods.name: initialized
methods.description: Confirm that the client has processed the initialize response. This is a notification (no response expected).

methods.name: workspace/git/pull
methods.description: Pulls changes from the remote repository for the workspace.

methods.name: workspace/remove
methods.description: Unregisters a workspace configuration.

methods.name: workspace/git/unstage
methods.description: Unstages the specified files in the workspace.

methods.name: repository/search
methods.description: Search for files using fuzzy, exact, prefix, or extension matching. Returns paginated results with match scores.

methods.name: initialize
methods.description: Initialize the connection and negotiate capabilities. Must be called first before using other methods.

params.name: protocolVersion
params.description: Protocol version the client supports

params.name: clientInfo
params.description: Client information

params.name: capabilities
params.description: Client capabilities

methods.name: client/session/focus
methods.summary: Set session focus for current client
methods.description: Notifies the server which session this client is currently viewing. The server will broadcast session_joined events to other clients viewing the same session.

params.name: workspace_id
params.description: Workspace ID

params.name: session_id
params.description: Session ID

methods.name: git/diff
methods.description: Returns the git diff for a specific file or all files.

params.name: path
params.description: File path relative to repository root (optional, omit for all files)

methods.name: git/commit
methods.description: Creates a commit with the staged changes.

params.name: message
params.description: Commit message

params.name: push
params.description: Push after commit

methods.name: git/push
methods.description: Pushes commits to the remote repository.

methods.name: session/watch
methods.description: Starts watching a session for real-time updates. The client will receive notifications when new messages are added.

params.name: session_id
params.description: Session ID to watch

methods.name: session/history
methods.summary: Get historical Claude sessions for a workspace (legacy, use workspace/session/history)
methods.description: Returns a list of historical Claude sessions from the session cache for the specified workspace. Sessions are stored at ~/.claude/projects/<encoded-path>.

methods.name: repository/stats
methods.description: Returns aggregate statistics about the repository including file counts by extension, largest files, and totals.

methods.name: shutdown
methods.description: Request the server to shut down gracefully.

methods.name: session/active
methods.description: Returns a list of all active sessions, optionally filtered by workspace.

methods.name: workspace/session/watch
methods.summary: Start watching a session for real-time updates
methods.description: Starts watching a session file for new messages. The client will receive claude_message events when new messages are added. Only one session can be watched at a time.

methods.name: workspace/unsubscribe
methods.description: Stop receiving events for a specific workspace.

methods.name: agent/respond
methods.summary: Respond to agent tool use request
methods.description: Sends a response to an agent's tool use request (e.g., permission approval).

params.name: tool_use_id
params.description: The tool use ID from the agent's request

params.name: response
params.description: The response content

params.name: is_error
params.description: Whether this is an error response

methods.name: agent/status
methods.description: Returns the current status of the AI agent.

methods.name: git/pull
methods.description: Pulls changes from the remote repository.

methods.name: session/messages
methods.description: Returns paginated messages for a specific session.

params.name: session_id
params.description: Session ID to get messages from

params.name: agent_type
params.description: Agent type (optional)

params.name: limit
params.description: Maximum messages to return (default 50, max 500)

params.name: offset
params.description: Offset for pagination

params.name: order
params.description: Sort order: 'asc' or 'desc' (default 'asc')

methods.name: repository/files/list
methods.description: Returns a paginated list of files in a directory with filtering and sorting options.

methods.name: git/unstage
methods.description: Unstages the specified files.

params.name: paths
params.description: Array of file paths to unstage

methods.name: file/list
methods.description: Returns the contents of a directory in the repository. Supports browsing the file tree.

params.name: path
params.description: Relative path from repo root (empty for root directory)

methods.name: session/elements
methods.description: Returns pre-parsed UI elements for a session, ready for rendering in mobile apps.

params.name: session_id
params.description: Session ID to get elements from

params.name: agent_type
params.description: Agent type (optional)

params.name: limit
params.description: Maximum elements to return (default 50, max 100)

params.name: before
params.description: Return elements before this ID (for pagination)

params.name: after
params.description: Return elements after this ID (for catch-up)

methods.name: workspace/get
methods.description: Returns detailed information about a specific workspace.

methods.name: session/stop
methods.description: Stops a running Claude CLI session.

methods.name: workspace/session/history
methods.summary: Get historical Claude sessions for a workspace
methods.description: Returns a list of historical Claude sessions from the session cache for the specified workspace. Sessions are stored at ~/.claude/projects/<encoded-path>.

methods.name: status/get
methods.description: Returns the current status of the cdev server including agent state, connected clients, and configuration.

methods.name: git/branches
methods.description: Returns the list of git branches.

methods.name: session/unwatch
methods.description: Stops watching the current session.

methods.name: workspace/update
methods.description: Updates workspace configuration settings.

methods.name: session/send
methods.summary: Send a prompt to a session
methods.description: Sends a prompt to the Claude CLI in the specified session.

methods.name: workspace/git/discard
methods.description: Discards uncommitted changes to the specified files in the workspace.

methods.name: workspace/git/push
methods.description: Pushes commits to the remote repository for the workspace.

methods.name: workspace/session/messages
methods.summary: Get messages from a historical Claude session
methods.description: Returns paginated messages from a Claude session file for the specified workspace. Use workspace/session/history to get available session IDs.

methods.name: workspace/git/checkout
methods.summary: Checkout a branch for a workspace
methods.description: Checks out the specified branch in the workspace.

methods.name: workspace/git/diff
methods.summary: Get git diff for a workspace
methods.description: Returns the git diff for the specified workspace.

methods.name: workspace/files/list
methods.summary: List files in a workspace directory
methods.description: Returns a paginated list of files and directories in a workspace. Matches the format of /api/repository/files/list.

methods.name: workspace/subscribe
methods.description: Subscribe to receive events for a specific workspace. By default, clients receive all events. After calling this method, only events for subscribed workspaces (and global events) will be forwarded.

methods.name: file/get
methods.description: Returns the content of a file from the repository.

params.name: path
params.description: File path relative to repository root

methods.name: session/delete
methods.description: Deletes a specific session or all sessions if no session_id is provided.

params.name: session_id
params.description: Session ID to delete (optional, deletes all if not provided)

params.name: agent_type
params.description: Agent type (optional)

methods.name: workspace/list
methods.description: Returns a list of all configured workspaces.

methods.name: workspace/add
methods.description: Registers a new workspace configuration. Can be any folder, not just git repositories. Set create_if_missing to true to create the directory if it doesn't exist.

params.name: create_if_missing
params.description: Create the directory if it doesn't exist

methods.name: workspace/session/activate
methods.summary: Set the active session for a workspace
methods.description: Sets the active session for a workspace. This allows iOS clients to switch which session they are viewing/interacting with. The active session ID will be included in workspace/list responses.
